$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
& N_{j,t} = N_{j,t-1}\text{e}^{\rho_j(E_t)}\text{e}^{\sum_{i=1}^n-\alpha_i N_{i,t-1}}\text{e}^{\varepsilon_{j,t-1}}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

Alternatively....

$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
& N_{j,t} = N_{j,t-1}\text{e}^{\rho_j(E_t)-\sum_{(i=1)}^n\alpha_i N_{i,t-1}+\varepsilon_{j,t-1}}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
